channel.title: org-babel on Hackrole's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in org-babel on Hackrole's Blog

item.title: tips while using org-babel
item.description: multiple block tangle to single file first format use `:noweb yes` and variable as placeholder. write code block with header `:noweb-ref ` <<config>> <<next-config>> (println "hello") (println "this following") (println "this is another ways") use name and collect (setq msg "Never a foot too far, even.") (message msg) (message "good bye") good bye <<init>> <<msg>> <<goodbye>> good bye
